ygData.subject: Re: Finally talking to Megaton/Constructicons Decision
ygData.msgSnippet: Havotron saluted back.  He too could tell that Megaton would want the final leadership of the Decepticons, but he was not sent to this measly planet to give up

Havotron saluted back.  He too could tell that Megaton would want 
the final leadership of the Decepticons, but he was not sent to this 
measly planet to give up control of what he would conquer to a 
freak.  

"Where is your base located, perhaps we should move it to join 
with ours." he said thoughfully.

<only so i can improve my power, and keep an extra eye on you>
